an5.211:1.1: “Yo so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu akkosakaparibhasako ariyupavadi sabrahmacarinam, tassa panca adinava patikankha.
an5.211:1.3: Parajiko va hoti chinnaparipantho, annataram va sankilittham apattim apajjati, balham va rogatankam phusati, sammulho kalam karoti, kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjati.
an5.211:1.4: Yo so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu akkosakaparibhasako ariyupavadi sabrahmacarinam, tassa ime panca adinava patikankha”ti.
